Our Story

Founded on the belief that every brand has a cinematic story waiting to be told.

Jalna's Leading Creative Agency

At Simplified Media Studio, we don't just capture moments; we create legacies. Positioned as the premier branding and production house in Jalna, we blend technical expertise with artistic vision to deliver content that stands out.

Our Mission: To turn your raw ideas into impactful visuals that drive engagement, build trust, and tell your unique story to the world.

{/* HERO SECTION */}

Visuals That Speak
Louder.

Your next big project is just one call away!

View Our Work Get a Quote
{/* FEATURED SERVICES TEASER */}

What We Do

Video Production

Commercials, documentaries, and brand films crafted with cinematic precision.

Photography

High-impact editorial and product photography that defines your visual identity.

Post-Production

Expert color grading, editing, and VFX to polish raw footage into masterpieces.

View All Services
{/* TRUSTED PARTNERS */}

Trusted By Industry Leaders

))}
{/* TESTIMONIALS SECTION */}

Client Stories

Sarah Jenkins

Marketing Director, LuxBrand

"Simplified Media turned our vague concept into a stunning visual reality. Highly professional team."

David Chen

Founder, TechStream

); }

source:
import Image from "next/image"; import Link from "next/link"; export const metadata = { title: "Services | Simplified Media Studio", }; export default function Services() { return (

Our Expertise

Comprehensive media solutions tailored to your unique requirements.

{/* Service 1 */}

Video Production

Bring Your Brand to Life

From script to screen, we handle every aspect of the production process. Whether it's a 30-second spot for TV or a 10-minute brand documentary for the web, we bring cinematic quality to every frame.

  • Commercials & TVcs
  • Corporate Interviews
  • Event Coverage
  • Product Demos
{/* Service 2 */}

Photography

Capture the Perfect Moment

Our photography team specializes in creating high-end imagery that speaks volumes. We focus on lighting, composition, and emotion to deliver photos that stand out in a crowded feed.

  • Editorial & Fashion
  • Product & E-commerce
  • Corporate Headshots
  • Architecture & Real Estate
{/* Service 3 */}

Post-Production

Polishing the Diamond

Our editing suites are where the magic happens. We use industry-standard tools to edit, color grade, and mix sound, ensuring your final product is nothing short of perfection.

  • Color Grading (DaVinci Resolve)
  • Visual Effects & Motion Graphics
  • Sound Design & Mixing
  • Format Conversion
{/* Service 4 */}

Social Media Management

Engage & Grow

We create short-form content designed to stop the scroll. From reels to stories, we manage your visual presence across all platforms.

  • Instagram Reels & TikToks
  • Content Strategy
  • Platform Management
  • Analytics & Reporting
{/* Service 5 */}

Drone Cinematography

Sky-High Perspectives

Capture breathtaking aerial views with our certified drone pilots. Perfect for real estate, events, and cinematic landscape shots.

  • 4K Aerial Video
  • Real Estate Surveys
  • Event Bird's-Eye View
  • FPV Dynamic Shots

The Process

1

Discovery

We sit down with you to understand your brand, your goals, and your audience. We script, storyboard, and plan every detail.

2

Production

Lights, camera, action. Our crew executes the vision using top-tier equipment and techniques to capture stunning raw material.

3

Delivery

Refining footage in post-production to deliver a final product that exceeds expectations.

); }

messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

fix.text: unknown

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.

fix.text: never

suggestions.desc: Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
